title: Statue Of Liberty National Monument: People
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     History & Culture     People               People          Edouard de Laboulaye Frederic-Auguste Bartholdi Eugene Viollet-le-Duc        The "Father of the Statue of Liberty." He provided the idea that would become the Statue. The French artist and sculptor who designed the Statue of Liberty Enlightening the World. The original architect hired to design a support structure for the Statue.   » Full Profile » Full Profile » Full Profile        Alexandre-Gustave Eiffel Richard Morris Hunt       The architect and engineer who replaced Viollet-le-Duc to design the Statue's internal support. The famous American architect who designed the pedestal under the Statue's feet.   » Full Profile » Full Profile        William Maxwell Evarts Richard Butler Charles P. Stone        The chairman of the American Committee for the Statue of Liberty. The secretary of the American Committee for the Statue of Liberty. The chief engineer for the pedestal construction.   » Full Profile » Full Profile » Full Profile        Joseph Pulitzer Emma Lazarus       The newspaper publisher who helped raise the money needed to complete the pedestal's construction. The poetess who wrote "The New Colossus" to help raise money for the pedestal's construction.   » Full Profile » Full Profile
